content:
@Rob Hausam and I are holding an "order catalog" track orientation session this Thursday at 17:00 UTC+2.
@Sandra Vance not seeing slide template available for connectathon 24, I reused and adapted a previous one.
@Grahame Grieve The kickoff and closing sessions are at an extremely unfriendly time for Europe. will they be registered so that we can replay them the next morning?
@David Hay The coman link does not work on the Connectathon 24 page. Could you provide the correct one?
Thank you all
@Sandra Vance is the right one to ask about kick-off.

François Macary said:

Sandra Vance not seeing slide template available for connectathon 24, I reused and adapted a previous one.

I did the same. If anyone wants to use it as a starting point, be my guest: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1lLTf6vHBSAm8rwjfeNIk8Si-wsVrYIOIkzdE3nbnpGM/edit?usp=sharing

@François Macary Slide template is now posted to Confluence 24 page. I am working on a way to record and post the kick off, demos, and closing. David Hay will be providing a new ConMan link today as well.
